Package de.uniba.wiai.kinf.lehre.ma13.model

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BackgroundImage
    class which implements IBackgroundImage.
    Layer
    layer class. handles the layer and its containing IGeometry Objects
    LayerStore
    the layerstore stores the set of layers and the background image. the list of layers itself contain all the geometries and objects which we draw on the canvas
    OrderedObject
    class which implements the
    Polygon
    polygon class. handles the polygon and its containing Points
